assignments.description: If no records were selected in one of the data tables in the Account Overview screen, then using the Add operator will add a "null" account. This causes an error when creating the Lead records, so to avoid this we remove all instances of such "null" accounts using an Account variable that is never populated.

fields.name: Bypass6MonthsRule
fields.fieldText: I want to add Accounts from the vesting period

value.stringValue: Accounts with Sales Play in the past 6 months
